name: SOULTAG - THE ARENA
description:
CURRENTLY IN VERSION 0.0.0 AND PC ONLY FOR THIS RUN.

Controls (next time they will in the game!)

Xbox Controller:
Out of battle (not targeting an enemy)
Movement - Left Stick
Pause - Start
Target enemy - RB or LB
In battle (targeting an enemy)
Movement - Left Stick
Pause - Start
Jump - A
Basic Attack - X
Elbow Attack - Y
Uppercut - B
Block - LT
Crouch - Hold left stick down
Target enemy/un-target enemy - RB or LB
Pause Menu
Move selection - Left Stick
Confirm choice - A
Resume Game - Start
Keyboard:
Out of battle (not targeting an enemy)
Movement - WASD
Pause - Escape
Target enemy - 9 or 0
In battle (targeting an enemy)
Movement - AD
Pause - Escape
Jump - Space
Basic Attack - E
Elbow Attack - R
Uppercut - F
Block - Left Shift
Crouch - S
Target enemy/un-target enemy - 9 or 0
Pause Menu
Move selection - W S
Confirm choice - Enter/
